Interactive plots of seasonally adjusted time series.

Source: R/make_plot_fig.R
make_plot_fig.Rd

A function that creates a list of interactive plots of time series seasonally adjusted with RJDemetra. Interactive plots are made with Plotly's R graphing library. Interactive plots show unadjusted series, seasonally adjusted series and trend.

Usage

make_plot_fig(
  models_in,
  series_now,
  plot_start = NULL,
  linearized = F,
  cal_adjust = F,
  ma_filter = F
)

Arguments

models_in

A list of output objects from the x13()-function.

series_now

Names of series to be plotted.

plot_start

Start date of time axis in plot.

linearized

Linearized times series to be shown in plots? Default is FALSE.

cal_adjust

Calender adjusted times series to be shown in plots? Default is FALSE.

ma_filter

1x3 asymmetric MA-filter to be shown in plots? Default is FALSE.

Value

List of plotly objects.

Examples


# Kommer noen eksempler her
